file.name: odd_api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: OpenDataDiscovery API Contract
  version: 0.0.1
  description: OpenDataDiscovery API Contract
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
paths:
  /ingestion/entities:
    post:
      description: Ingests list of data entities
      operationId: postDataEntityList
      tags:
        - OpenDataDiscoveryIngestion
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './entities.yaml/#/components/schemas/DataEntityList'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
  
  /ingestion/datasources:
    post:
      description: Creates data sources in the target catalog
      operationId: createDataSource
      tags:
        - OpenDataDiscoveryIngestion
      requestBody: 
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './entities.yaml/#/components/schemas/DataSourceList'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /ingestion/datasources: post: operation "createDataSource": requestBody: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "./entities.yaml/#/components/schemas/DataSourceList": external "./entities.yaml/": file: local file reference is not allowed
